#summary Retrieve an asset from the asset service.
#labels Protocol-Asset

= Request Format =

{{{
GET /assets/e1d3e830-36cd-4232-aa8c-01325320e533 HTTP/1.1
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||Content-SHA1||The SHA-1 hash of the asset||40-character hexadecimal string||
||Last-Modified||RFC870 timestamp||RFC870 String||
||X-ASSET-CREATOR-ID||UUID of the asset's creator||UUID||
||X-ASSET-FLAGS||Bit flags for the asset||AssetFlags||
||Content-Type||The content type of the asset||ContentType||

{{{
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Wed, 09 Dec 2009 07:48:17 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Asset Server
Content-SHA1: cc36b88d9d2dcd1f4a00bc76546a767e367cfd39
Last-Modified: Wednesday, 09-Dec-09 07:48:17 GMT
X-ASSET-CREATOR-ID: b9f9048e-2af0-4dba-ae24-9e23d5511ace
X-ASSET-FLAGS: 1
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Content-Type: image/tga

(raw asset data)
}}}

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 200
    * Asset data follows
  * 404
    * Asset was not found
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred

= Code Examples =

PHP:

{{{
$assetID = 'e1d3e830-36cd-4232-aa8c-01325320e533';
$r = new HttpRequest('http://services.example.com/assets/' . $assetID, HttpRequest::METH_GET);
$r->send();
$assetData = $r->getResponseBody();
}}}
